note.p: Birth: Prinknash Park, Gloucestershire, England (11 August 1829)
Death: Caius College Lodge, Cambridge (31 January 1903)
Education: Eton; Caius College, Cambridge. BA (1851), MA, DD (1881)

Career: Fellow (1854) and Tutor, Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge; ordained deacon (1859); ordained priest (1861); Master of Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge (1880); crippled by rheumatoid arthritis
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 273-276 signed by E J R
